medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient sought treatment after three episodes of left amaurosis fugax during a 2-week period.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The episodes of left amaurosis fugax occurred over a 2-week period, after which the patient underwent evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a 17-year history of upper limb, head, and voice tremor, as well as a 12-month history of nocturnal visual difficulties. Asthma and migraine present since adolescence. Severe depression developed at age 45.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's father had mild action tremor in adolescence. A maternal half-uncle is registered blind with retinitis pigmentosa.
